features.name: Chat Interface
features.description: Main conversational interface with support for text and image input, message history, and conversation management

features.name: Multi-Provider LLM Support
features.description: Supports multiple LLM providers including OpenAI (GPT-4, GPT-3.5) and Google Gemini with vision capabilities

features.name: Tavily Web Search Integration
features.description: Web search tool powered by Tavily API with image preview support and link metadata extraction

features.name: Image Handling System
features.description: Comprehensive multimodal image system supporting upload, generation (DALL-E), clipboard paste, and display with galleries

features.name: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) System
features.description: Advanced RAG system with document chunking, embedding, vector search, reranking, and citation support

features.name: File Management System
features.description: Upload, process, and manage various file types (PDF, DOCX, CSV, Excel, images) with thumbnail generation and text extraction

features.name: Memory System
features.description: Long-term memory extraction and management to remember important information across conversations

features.name: Agent System
features.description: Configurable AI agents with custom system prompts, tools, and personas for specialized tasks

features.name: Conversation Insights
features.description: Automatic analysis of conversations with summaries, key points extraction, sentiment analysis, and action items

features.name: Conversation Export
features.description: Export conversations in multiple formats (Markdown, HTML, JSON) with timestamp and metadata

features.name: Diagram Generation
features.description: Generate various diagram types (mermaid, plantuml, graphviz, etc.) via Kroki service integration

features.name: Data Analysis Tools
features.description: Analyze CSV/Excel data with automatic visualization generation (matplotlib, plotly, seaborn)

features.name: Web Scraping Tools
features.description: Multiple web scraping methods including BeautifulSoup, Playwright, Firecrawl with smart content extraction

features.name: YouTube Integration
features.description: Extract and analyze YouTube video transcripts and metadata for content understanding

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: User registration, login, and session management with bcrypt password hashing

features.name: Prompt Library
features.description: Pre-built prompt templates for common tasks with categorization and search functionality

features.name: Settings & Configuration
features.description: Centralized configuration management with environment variables and model configuration

features.name: Database Layer
features.description: SQLAlchemy-based database models and operations for conversations, users, files, RAG, memory, and agents

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable Streamlit components for sidebar, header, and UI utilities with custom CSS styling

features.name: API Key Management
features.description: Secure management of API keys for various services (OpenAI, Gemini, Tavily, etc.)
